/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a concrete median, is filled with a variety of vehicles including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. 

On either side of the street, lush green trees and bushes provide a stark contrast to the concrete structures, hinting at the blend of nature and urban development in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
